description: 香港藝術中心是一個藝術組織,旨在促進在香港及以後的當代藝術和文化,包括介紹本地及海外藝術家,涵蓋範圍廣泛的藝術形式,包括媒體,視覺表演藝術,戲劇和電影.

description: 第五十九屆世界統計大會為國際統計社群提供一個分享和展示最新統計知識與創新意念的平台.大會的科學議程涵蓋廣泛的議題,讓各統計領域的專家及從業員進行專業交流暨分享.

description:
The Standard is the only free local English paper, and its magazine publications.
Topics spanned from health, education, food and wine, wedding to business services. The paper is available at http://www.thestandard.com.hk/

Artalk is a pioneering website and magazine project dedicated to art review. It is the first platform in Hong Kong opened to writers of any background and education to review art exhibitions extensively.

L’ORÉAL LUXE Travel Retail Asia Pacific markets and distributes luxury cosmetics and fragrances sold in selected Travel Retail outlets in Asia Pacific region, including Lancôme, Ralph Lauren, Giorgio Armani, Cacharel, Guy Laroche, Helena Rubinstein, Shu Uemura, Biotherm, Kiehl’s & YSL.
